intro.description: Add a GEM by using content assist.

item.title: Edit the GEM's name name
item.description: The name of the GEM should be the fully qualified name used by the Ruby gems system.

subitem.label: Modify the "gemName" to reflect the name of the gem.

item.title: Edit the GEM's version
item.description: The gem's version should reflect the wanted version of the GEM from the Ruby gems system.

subitem.label: Modify the 'rational version number' after the 'gem:' version type prefix.
Press TAB to complete the template.
